Title: A Muppets Christmas: Letters to Santa
Writer: Hugh Fink (teleplay by), Scott Ganz (teleplay by), Andrew Samson (teleplay by), Paul Williams (teleplay by), Paul Williams (story by), Hugh Fink (story by), Scott Ganz (story by), Andrew Samson (story by)
Actors: Steve Whitmire, Dave Goelz, Bill Barretta, Eric Jacobson
Plot: When Gonzo accidentally diverts three letters to Santa, he talks Kermit and his friends into delivering them to the North Pole personally.
